unnormalised: Crop insurance, eh? Helpful, I guess. Heard mixed things from folks in my village, near Kozhikode. Last Onam, many farmers were worried. Some got payouts, others didn't. Rs. 10,000/acre coverage seems low, no? Needs to improve, or everyone will be eating just biryani! SBI is pushing it hard.
normalised: Crop insurance, eh? Helpful, I guess. Heard mixed things from folks in my village, near Kozhikode. Last Onam, many farmers were worried. Some got payouts, others did not. Rupee ten thousand per acre coverage seems low, no? Needs to improve, or everyone will be eating just biryani! S B I is pushing it hard.
